name: K8:C2
description:
If you are a kind of person who feels relieved or fulfilled upon understanding a thing hidden, then you may take a moment to consider the artifact. Reflect upon its transformations, identify the patterns, and learn to be a confident manipulator. No lights will flash, no achievements will be unlocked; the game ends when you are done with it.

K8:C2 was made using flickgame, a tool created by Stephen Lavelle.
